parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns selected units in source group for normal commanding mode (individual units). For the High Command equivalent, see [[hcSelected]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''groupSelectedUnits''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_selectedUnits = [[groupSelectedUnits]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[groupSelectUnit]]
</value></part></template>
